类 SensorView

  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.ScrollPaneConstants
    直接已知子类:
    AccelerometerView, BarcodeReaderView, GravityView, GyroscopeView, LightView, LinearAccelerationView, MagneticFieldView, OrientationView, PressureView, ProximityView, RotationVectorView, TemperatureView

    public abstract class SensorView
extends javax.swing.JScrollPane
    SensorView keeps the GUI for a sensor. It contains fields and methods common to all sensors and methods that must be implemented for each one.
    作者:
    ilarele
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

      • getSafeDouble

        public double getSafeDouble(javax.swing.JTextField textfield)

      • getSafeDouble

        public double getSafeDouble(javax.swing.JTextField textfield,
                            double defaultValue)
        Safely retries the double value of a text field. If the value is not a valid number, 0 is returned, and the field is marked red.
        参数:
        textfield - TextField from which the value should be read.
        defaultValue - default value if input field is invalid.
        返回:
        double value.

      • getSafeDoubleList

        public static double[] getSafeDoubleList(javax.swing.JTextField textfield)
        Safely retries the a list of double values of a text field. If the list contains errors, null is returned, and the field is marked red.
        参数:
        textfield - TextField from which the value should be read.
        返回:
        list double[] with values or null.
